snap(-30,-30,-30)
sky(0,0,0)
fog(0,0,0)
ground(0,0,0)
polys(50,0,0)
lightson()
fadefrom(2000)
name(KILL-O-MATIC's Lair)
nlaps(4)

maaxb(3,30000,4000)
maaxb(3,30000,-13500)
maaxt(3,-30000,4000)
maaxt(3,-30000,-13500)

maaxr(12,1000,-27000)
maaxr(1,1000,27000)
maaxl(12,-1000,-27000)
maaxl(1,-1000,27000)

maaxr(12,-16200,-27000)
maaxr(1,-16200,27000)
maaxl(12,16200,-27000)
maaxl(1,16200,27000)


maaxb(10,-31800,-21500)
maaxt(10,31800,-21500)
maaxr(15,17800,-32000)
maaxl(15,-17800,-32000)

set(47,0,0,250,0)
fix(41,0,0,250,0)
set(10,0,0,250,0)pa
set(10,0,5600,250,0)p
set(10,0,11200,250,0)p
set(10,0,16800,250,0)p
set(10,0,22400,250,0)p
set(10,0,28000,250,0)p
chk(40,0,30000,250,0)

set(10,0,31000,250,90)pt
set(10,-5600,31000,250,90)p
set(10,-11200,31000,250,90)p
set(10,-13000,31000,250,90)p
chk(40,-15900,31000,250,90)
set(14,-17000,31000,250,0)pt

set(10,-17000,27000,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,22400,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,16800,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,11200,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,5600,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,0,250,0)
set(28,-17000,0,250,0)pr
set(10,-17000,-5600,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,-11200,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,-16800,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,-22400,250,0)p
set(10,-17000,-27000,250,0)p
chk(40,-17000,-29900,250,0)
set(14,-17000,-31000,250,90)pt

set(10,-13000,-31000,250,90)p
set(10,-11200,-31000,250,90)p
set(10,-5600,-31000,250,90)p
set(10,0,-31000,250,90)pt
chk(40,0,-30000,250,0)

set(10,0,-28000,250,0)p
set(10,0,-22400,250,0)p
set(10,0,-16800,250,0)p
set(10,0,-11200,250,0)p
set(10,0,-5600,250,0)p



set(10,0,0,250,0)pa
set(10,0,5600,250,0)p
set(10,0,11200,250,0)p
set(10,0,16800,250,0)p
set(10,0,22400,250,0)p
set(10,0,27000,250,0)p
chk(40,0,30000,250,0)

set(10,0,31000,250,90)pt
set(10,5600,31000,250,90)p
set(10,11200,31000,250,90)p
set(10,13000,31000,250,90)p

set(10,17000,27000,250,0)p
set(10,17000,22400,250,0)p
set(10,17000,16800,250,0)p

set(10,17000,5600,250,0)p
set(10,17000,0,250,0)p
set(37,17450,0,250,0)
set(37,17150,0,250,0)
chk(40,17000,0,250,0)
set(37,16850,0,250,0)
set(37,16550,0,250,0)
set(10,17000,-5600,250,0)p
set(10,17000,-11200,250,0)p
set(10,17000,-16800,250,0)p
set(10,17000,-22400,250,0)p

set(14,17000,-31000,250,180)pt

set(10,13000,-31000,250,90)p
